name: SQS
description: Simple Queue Service for message queuing

name.label: Queue Name
name.description: The name of the SQS queue

visibility_timeout_seconds.label: Visibility Timeout (seconds)
visibility_timeout_seconds.description: The length of time a message is hidden from other consumers

message_retention_seconds.label: Message Retention (seconds)
message_retention_seconds.description: The number of seconds to retain messages in the queue (max 14 days = 1209600 seconds)

delay_seconds.label: Delay Seconds
delay_seconds.description: The number of seconds to delay the delivery of messages

max_receive_count.label: Max Receive Count
max_receive_count.description: Maximum number of times a message can be received (for DLQ configuration)

content_based_deduplication.label: Content-Based Deduplication
content_based_deduplication.description: Enable content-based deduplication for FIFO queues

dead_letter_queue.label: Enable Dead Letter Queue
dead_letter_queue.description: Configure a dead letter queue for failed messages

kms_master_key_id.label: KMS Master Key ID
kms_master_key_id.description: The ID of an AWS-managed customer master key (CMK) for Amazon SQS

kms_data_key_reuse_period_seconds.label: KMS Data Key Reuse Period (seconds)
kms_data_key_reuse_period_seconds.description: The length of time for which Amazon SQS can reuse a data key to encrypt or decrypt messages
